tool_description: Creates structured survey instruments for community needs assessment with various question types and validation.

research_objectives.description: Specific research questions or objectives the survey should address

target_population.description: Description of the intended survey respondents

survey_length.description: Preferred survey length: short (5-10 questions), medium (11-20), long (21-30)

language_accessibility.description: Whether to include accessibility considerations for multiple languages

error_messages: Empty research objectives: Provide at least one research objective.
Invalid survey length: Use one of [short, medium, long].
Undefined target population: Specify who the survey is intended for.
Too many objectives: Limit research objectives to 10 or fewer for survey feasibility.
usage: Input research objectives and target population details. Optionally specify survey length preferences and question types. Tool generates a structured survey with appropriate questions and response formats.

survey_questions.description: Complete list of survey questions with response formats

administration_notes.description: Guidelines for survey administration and data collection

estimated_completion_time.description: Estimated minutes to complete the survey
